mapper.select: SELECT G.id AS gacha_id , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = G.file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , G.view_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE gacha_id = G.id) AS wish_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_PICK_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = G.id) AS total_pick_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = G.id) AS trade_count , G.created_at , G.updated_at FROM GACHA G WHERE G.id = #{gachaId}

SELECT GI.id AS gacha_item_id , GI.name , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_PICK_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = GI.gacha_id AND gacha_item_id = GI.id) AS pick_count FROM GACHA_ITEM GI WHERE GI.gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY GI.created_at ASC
SELECT gacha_item_id , COUNT(gacha_item_id) AS count FROM GACHA_PICK_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} AND user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY gacha_id, gacha_item_id, user_id ORDER BY gacha_item_id ASC
SELECT id AS place_id , address , name , is_default FROM USER_PLACE WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default = 'Y' DESC, created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE GACHA SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{gachaId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gacha_id = #{gachaId}
